question: Who has won the Dr Babasaheb Ambedkar International Foundation Kerala State award for the year 2016-17?
explanation: Dileep K Nair, the youngest-ever chancellor of India, has won the Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar International Foundation Kerala State award for the year 2016-17 for excellent performance in the field of education.  in Trivendurum, Kerala. Currently, he is the Chancellor of the  North East Frontier Technical University NEFTU in Arunachal Pradesh. Nair has around 12 years of experience in various Educational Projects in different parts of the country. He is also the founder of The Automobile Society (India) and The Engineer\'s Outlook Magazine.
